languages.text: Returns Cybermastiff to life with full wounds and no traumas. Cooldown: 2.

traits.locale_text: Returns Cybermastiff to life with full wounds and no traumas. Cooldown: 2.

languages.text: The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.
languages.original_text: Арбитр-псарь может вернуть к жизни убитого кибермастифа с половиной запаса здоровья. Также с кибермастифа будут сняты все {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмы{/g}. Может использоваться не более 2 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Одного кибермастифа можно вернуть к жизни только 1 раз.

traits.locale_text: The leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its maximum wounds and no traumas. Can only be used twice per turn. Each cyber-mastiff can only be re-activated once.

The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.

The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.

languages.text: Арбитр-псарь может вернуть к жизни убитого кибермастифа с половиной запаса здоровья. Также с кибермастифа будут сняты все {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмы{/g}. Может использоваться не более 2 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Одного кибермастифа можно вернуть к жизни только 1 раз.
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.

languages.text: Tasmacı, alt edilen bir siber mastifi {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık puanının{/g} yarısı ve sıfır {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g} ile hayata döndürebilir. Her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} yalnızca bir kez kullanılabilir. Her siber mastif yalnızca bir kez yeniden başlatılabilir.
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.

traits.locale_text: Tasmacı, alt edilen bir siber mastifi {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık puanının{/g} yarısı ve sıfır {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g} ile hayata döndürebilir. Her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} yalnızca bir kez kullanılabilir. Her siber mastif yalnızca bir kez yeniden başlatılabilir.

languages.text: El amo adiestrador puede devolver la vida a un cibermastín derrotado con la mitad de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} y sin ninguna {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g}. Solo puede utilizarse dos veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Cada cibermastín solo puede reactivarse una vez.
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.

traits.locale_text: El amo adiestrador puede devolver la vida a un cibermastín derrotado con la mitad de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} y sin ninguna {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g}. Solo puede utilizarse dos veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Cada cibermastín solo puede reactivarse una vez.

languages.text: 训犬师可以让一只被击败的生化獒犬重新返回战场，恢复{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的一半，消除所有{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。 此能力每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}最多只能使用两次。 每只生化獒犬只能重新激活一次。
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.

traits.locale_text: 训犬师可以让一只被击败的生化獒犬重新返回战场，恢复{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的一半，消除所有{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。 此能力每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}最多只能使用两次。 每只生化獒犬只能重新激活一次。

languages.text: Le maître-mastiff peut ramener à la vie un cyber-mastiff vaincu avec la moitié de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} et sans {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g}. Utilisable seulement deux fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Chaque cyber-mastiff ne peut être réactivé qu'une fois.
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.

traits.locale_text: Le maître-mastiff peut ramener à la vie un cyber-mastiff vaincu avec la moitié de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} et sans {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g}. Utilisable seulement deux fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Chaque cyber-mastiff ne peut être réactivé qu'une fois.

languages.text: リーシュマスターは、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の半分と{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}なしの状態で倒れたサイバーマスチフを戻すことができる。 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に2回までしか使用できない。 各サイバーマスチフは、一度だけしか再起動できない。
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.

traits.locale_text: リーシュマスターは、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の半分と{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}なしの状態で倒れたサイバーマスチフを戻すことができる。 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に2回までしか使用できない。 各サイバーマスチフは、一度だけしか再起動できない。

languages.text: Der Leinenmeister kann einen besiegten Cyber-Mastiff mit der Hälfte seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} und ohne {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g} ins Leben zurückholen. Kann pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nur zweimal eingesetzt werden. Jeder Cyber-Mastiff kann nur einmal reaktiviert werden.
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster can bring a defeated cyber-mastiff back to life with half its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Can only be used twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Each cyber-mastiff can only be reactivated once.

traits.locale_text: Der Leinenmeister kann einen besiegten Cyber-Mastiff mit der Hälfte seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} und ohne {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g} ins Leben zurückholen. Kann pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nur zweimal eingesetzt werden. Jeder Cyber-Mastiff kann nur einmal reaktiviert werden.
